abstracts.cdata!:
The additional credit for the Azerbaijan
            Rehabilitation and Completion of Irrigation and Drainage
            Infrastructure Project will help finance a cost overrun to
            complete irrigation and drainage infrastructure works under
            the original project. The cost overrun mainly occurred due
            to: (1) an increase during the last few years in the price
            of construction materials, in particular steel and cement,
            and fuel; and (2) a greater than anticipated volume of
            rehabilitation work for one component of the project. The
            additional financing will be required to fund all the
            originally planned activities in full, specifically the
            rehabilitation and enlargement of the Samur-Apsheron Canal
            (SAC) main supply system from km 27 to 50. It will thus
            mainly be used to carry out the last civil works contract,
            but there will also be small allocations to finance
            consultants. The original project development objectives and
            expected outcomes will remain unchanged.
